# Pursuit AI Safety Performance Dashboard - Development Guide

## Project Status

This is a modern, enterprise-grade Safety Performance Dashboard with React, TypeScript, Recharts, and Tailwind CSS.

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Project scaffolding complete
- [x] Dependencies configured
- [x] TypeScript setup
- [x] Tailwind CSS configured
- [x] Core components created
- [x] Mock data implemented
- [x] Color system defined

## Next Steps

1. Install dependencies:
   ```bash
   npm install
   ```

2. Start development server:
   ```bash
   npm run dev
   ```

3. Open in browser at `http://localhost:5173`

## Project Structure

- `src/components/` - React components
- `src/data/` - Mock data and TypeScript interfaces
- `src/constants/` - Configuration constants
- `tailwind.config.js` - Tailwind CSS customization
- `tsconfig.json` - TypeScript configuration

## Available Scripts

- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Key Features

✓ KPI Summary Cards (Total Inspections, OFIs, High Priority, Categories)
✓ Global Date Range Filter
✓ Tabbed Interface (Overview, Inspections, Trends, Categories)
✓ Interactive Charts (Trends, Categories, Quarterly)
✓ Responsive Design
✓ Modern UI with consistent color scheme
